name: CoLab
description: Do you have what it takes to solve more than 100 challenging puzzles in the first virtual reality show while being 'advised' by our witty narrator to entertain the audience?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
